rationale: High friction in high-value electronics purchases due to inflation; BNPL (Buy Now Pay Later) is the strongest conversion driver in the current Iranian economy.
recommended_approach: Integrated 'Smart Purchase' campaign where expensive items (Laptops/Phones) are advertised solely through the lens of monthly installments rather than total price.
timing: September (Back to School) and February (Pre-Nowruz electronics refresh)

rationale: Synergy between physical book sales on Digikala and digital consumption; targeting the intellectual/student demographic.
recommended_approach: Bundle physical 'Coffee Table' books or stationery with a free 3-month Fidibo Plus subscription code inside the package.
timing: Tehran International Book Fair season (May) and Yalda Night (December)

rationale: Converting 'planned' shoppers into 'impulse' grocery shoppers by leveraging the trust of the main brand.
potential_reach: 8 million urban dwellers in major metros
recommended_approach: Retargeting users who browse FMCG on the main app with a 'Get it in 45 mins' coupon for the Jet sub-app.

rationale: Complementary digital ecosystem leaders; Snapp users are the highest-probability digital spenders for Digikala.
recommended_approach: Points exchange program: Convert SnappClub points into Digikala discount vouchers for high-demand categories like Beauty.
